settings.title: See the Difference
settings.text: Flattering, Classic, and Versatile. We’re certain the Pocket Tee will become a staple in your wardrobe.
settings.subtitle: Did You Know?
settings.imgtext: 100% of our profits go to fighting blindness? Learn More

settings.heading: We Know Vision
settings.content: Flattering, Classic, and Versatile. We’re certain the Pocket Tee will become a staple in your wardrobe.
settings.subtitle: Replacements Forever
settings.imgtext:
Crafted in partnership with L’Amy America for the best quality!
Learn more

settings.content: Sunglasses can help protect your eyes from UV rays, but not all pairs are created equal. In fact, wearing unpolarized shades can cause more damage than wearing nothing at all.
That’s why we made this collection – featuring break-and scratch resistant, double-sided polarized lenses that absorb 100% of UVA and UVB rays, plus an easy replacement policy...
...because sunglasses are the 4th most commonly lost item by adults. We don’t think you should have to choose between awesome sun protection or a cheap pair of subpar sunglasses.

settings.heading: We Take Eye Health Seriously.
settings.content: It’s a fact: whether you have 20/20 vision or Stargardt's Disease like us, sun exposure causes retinal damage and vision loss over time.

settings.title: UV? NO THANKS.
settings.content: Even on cloudy days, the sun’s UVA and UVB rays can cause damage. UVA damages the retina at the back of your eye while UVB can cause degradation to the cornea and lens at the front of your eye.

settings.title: GET POLARIZED
settings.content: Without polarized lenses, you’re better off wearing nothing. Cheap shades simulate darkness without filtering UVA or UVB rays, letting pupils dilate to let in more light – causing more damage to your eyes.

settings.title: 100% PROTECTION
settings.content: Our Cavaliers’ polarized lenses filter 100% of UVA + UVB rays, eliminate glare, and reduce eye strain, all which can help slow vision loss – even for people already experiencing it.

settings.title: Protection Perfected
settings.content: Did you know: the more you expose your eyes to UV rays, the higher your risk of vision loss and damage to the cornea, retina, and lens?

settings.title: We’re on a mission
settings.description: 100% of our profits are dedicated to curing blindness. Learn more at fightingblindness.org

settings.title: Quality for a cause
settings.description: We make high quality products that we love! Just ask over 550,000 happy customers.

settings.title: Free & Easy Returns
settings.description: If you’re not completely in love with your purchase, you can return it free and easy. No questions asked!
